name: Sawyer
description:
This is an ongoing Work in Progress!

Contains sensitive material relating to the efects of Depression which some people may find difficult, offensive or disturbing.

Including themes of Depression, Grief & Suicide.

I have included contact details for several organisations that players can reach out to should they relate to anything depicted within my work.

This game is based on several of my own life experiences, places I've been and people I've known.

Please be warned in the current build the game does not end automatically, once you finish the game you will have to use Alt + f4 to close the game.
